description:
The NRS Crew Child PFD gives your child the safety they need when on or near the water. This comfortable life jacket is perfect for flatwater boating and close-to-shore safety.

  • Construction uses 200-denier nylon on the shell and lining
  • High quality foam for buoyancy
  • Centre zip access is easy to get on and off
  • Adjustable sides and waist
  • Grab strap on collar for ease of rescue
  • Padded shoulders are contoured for better mobility and comfort
  • Adjustable leg strap
  • Recommended weight: 33-55lbs (15-25kg)
name: NRS Crew Child PFD - Children to Youths
